thread.section_title: 4seating.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 4seating.com | 4seating.com | 2 of 24
thread.title: Melissa B

author: Melissa B
title: Melissa B
text:
I've ordered a few things with 4seating and their sister company, theaterseat.com
This last order for a reading lamp and tray table accessory for my Rialto seats, hit a snag. They sent the lamp and table, but forgot to include the accessory pod you use to install them. The pod is supposed to be included with the purchase of the lamp, which was the sole reason I bought it.
Fernando was helpful and apologetic about the situation, and immediately issued an order for them to send me the missing pod. I received an email confirming that the order went through, and I should have my missing piece in a few days.
Thank you for the help, Fernando, I appreciate it.
